# edmar.sh llms.txt

> Ed Marsh: Senior technical writer and content strategist with 30+ years of experience, seeking employment opportunities. Demonstrates AI-enhanced workflows, strategic content leadership, and proven ability to build scalable documentation systems. This portfolio site was built from scratch using AI-assisted development while maintaining full editorial control and quality standards.

- [Ed Marsh Portfolio & Overview](https://edmar.sh): Senior technical writer seeking employment - 30+ years experience in technical writing, content strategy, and AI-enhanced workflows.
- [Contact Ed Marsh](https://edmar.sh/contact/): Direct contact for employment opportunities, interviews, and professional discussions.
- [About Ed Marsh](https://edmar.sh/about/about-ed-marsh/): Professional background demonstrating strategic content leadership and cross-functional collaboration skills.

## Podcasts

## Professional Skills & Capabilities

- [Core Skills Portfolio](https://edmar.sh/skills/): Comprehensive overview of technical writing, content strategy, and leadership capabilities for potential employers.
- [Content Strategy Leadership](https://edmar.sh/skills/content-strategy/): Strategic content planning, governance, and organizational content effectiveness - managed 35+ products.
- [Information Architecture Expertise](https://edmar.sh/skills/information-architecture/): User-focused content structure and navigation design - reduced content by 50% while increasing engagement.
- [Technical Writing Excellence](https://edmar.sh/skills/technical-writing/): API documentation, user guides, and cross-functional collaboration with development teams.
- [Website Reviews & Content Audits](https://edmar.sh/skills/website-reviews/): Content performance analysis and optimization strategies with measurable results.
- [Data-Driven Content Metrics](https://edmar.sh/skills/metrics/): Analytics implementation, custom dashboards, and content ROI measurement for executive reporting.
- [Community Building & Stakeholder Management](https://edmar.sh/skills/community/): Cross-functional collaboration, content champion programs, and organizational change management.
- [Content Creation & Podcasting](https://edmar.sh/skills/podcasting/): End-to-end content series management, from concept to publication and metrics analysis.
- [Technical Implementation Skills](https://edmar.sh/skills/code-development/): AI-enhanced development workflows, modern web technologies, and documentation system architecture.

## AI-Enhanced Development & Modern Technical Skills

- [Content Strategy for Static Site Generators](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/content-strategy-for-ssgs/): Strategy for static site content.
- [Static Site Transformation Project](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/): Complete documentation of building this portfolio site from scratch using AI-assisted development while maintaining editorial control.
- [AI Documentation Showcase](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/ai-doc-output/): AI-generated documentation for Ed Marsh’s static website.
- [AI Documentation Output (Original)](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/ai-doc-output-orig/): Documentation of static site implementation using Eleventy, Tailwind CSS, and Nunjucks.
- [AI in Technical Writing](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/writing-with-ai/): AI’s role in technical documentation.
- [Choosing a Static Site Generator](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/choosing-static-site-generator/): Guide to selecting a static site generator.
- [Static Site Transformation – Motivation](https://edmar.sh/static-site-transformation/why/): Motivations and goals for static site transformation.
